translation.en: ♪ I get up in the evening ♪
♪ And I ain't got nothing to say ♪
It really hasn't dated at all.
Don't let the fact that I've made A-team every year add to the pressure.
translation.zh: 别让我每年入选A队的事实给你压力

translation.en: Can we please get this crap off?
-All right, mate. -Hey. You're not playing, Adam?
translation.zh: -好吧-嘿 你不上场吗？亚当
上场？ 是的 亲子对抗赛

translation.en: Sorry. It's Dads V Lads. I... forgot.
translation.zh: 抱歉 是亲子对抗赛 我忘了

translation.en: Right, it looks like we've found our goalie.
translation.zh: 好 看起来我们的守门员有人选了

translation.en: Here's to total humiliation by kids.
Speak for yourself. I thought I had a good game.
translation.zh: 你自己说就算了 我觉得我踢得不错

translation.en: [Adam] Oh, god. He's putting up a flip chart.
translation.zh: 噢 天 他在摆挂图

translation.en: [man] Wait till he hands out the agenda.
Tell her I've been on teacher trips. I know what goes on.
translation.zh: 跟她说我去过教师旅行我知道怎么回事
嘿 宝贝 会议还好吗？

translation.en: [Corinne] Aw, it's tough, it's really tough.
translation.zh: 很艰难 真的很艰难

translation.en: I'm currently recuperating after a hot bath and two glasses of Rioja.
translation.zh: 洗了个热水澡 喝了两杯里奥哈我才开始缓过劲来

translation.en: Well, me and the boys are on a pub crawl.
Hey, listen, did you know it was dads and lads?
translation.zh: 嘿 你知道这是亲子对抗赛吗？

translation.en: Yeah, I wrote it on the note.
translation.zh: 是的 我写在便签上了

translation.en: -What note? -The one that's attached to the fridge.
Listen, will you text me when you know which team he's on?
translation.zh: 你知道他进了什么队记得发短信给我

translation.en: Oh, God, I hope it's the A.
translation.zh: 噢 天 我希望是A队

translation.en: Tom's really winding him up, and this Ryan swearing thing...
translation.zh: 汤姆很大压力 还有赖安口不择言的

translation.en: I know. God, it's a nightmare.
translation.zh: 我知道 天 这是噩梦

translation.en: Potty-mouthed little prick. Takes after his mother.
translation.zh: 脏话连篇的混蛋 跟他妈一样

translation.en: Ah, yeah, well, I'm... I'm just gutted I can't be there.
translation.zh: 对 很遗憾我不在场

translation.en: I think you've done this on purpose.
I don't think there even is a conference. I'm gonna ask the other teachers.
translation.zh: 我想根本就没有什么会议我会问问其他老师

translation.en: Actually, know what? I better get going.
I have got dinner in half an hour.
translation.zh: 我要在半小时内吃晚餐

translation.en: All right, love. Well, you enjoy yourself.
translation.zh: 好的 爱你 你好好休息

translation.en: Oh, yeah, I will. I fully intend to.
Wife left you to it, has she?
translation.zh: 你老婆扔下你 对吗？

translation.en: So have you got a kid playing in the match or what?
You didn't have to stay with her, you know.
Corinne. You didn't have to stay when she told you she was pregnant.
translation.zh: 歌莲 她说怀孕的时候你其实不用留在她身边

translation.en: I'm sorry. Do... do I know you?
translation.zh: 不好意思 我认识你吗？

translation.en: Two years ago, she told you she was pregnant, right?
translation.zh: 两年前 她说她怀孕了 对吗？

translation.en: She told you she was pregnant and then she lost the baby.
translation.zh: 她跟你说怀孕了 但后来意外流产

translation.en: She made it up. She was never pregnant.
translation.zh: 那是她编造的 她从未怀孕

translation.en: Who are you? Why are you saying this?
translation.zh: 你是谁？你为什么说这些？

translation.en: Think of me as a stranger. A stranger that knows.
translation.zh: 你就当我是一个知情的陌生人

translation.en: Cast your mind back to that time. Did you ever see her naked?
translation.zh: 你回想一下当时 你看过她裸身吗？

translation.en: Excuses to avoid sex and sickness.
translation.zh: 这是避免做爱和生病的借口

translation.en: When the miscarriage came, you look back and realized
translation.zh: 当流产发生 你回头看会发现

translation.en: the pregnancy had been difficult from the start.
How do you know my wife? Who the hell are you?
translation.zh: 你怎么认识我老婆？你究竟是谁？

translation.en: All right, folks, grab your beers.
translation.zh: 好了 各位 拿着你们的啤酒

translation.en: Let's get this show on the road.
[sighs] Think of me as a friend that just released you from prison.
translation.zh: 你就当我是个朋友要将你从囚牢里放出来

translation.en: -You should be thanking me. -Yeah? Why is that?
Because now you know she's a liar.
translation.zh: 因为现在你知道她是个骗子

translation.en: If you need proof, look at your Visa card
translation.zh: 如果你要证据 查一下你的信用卡

translation.en: and check for a charge to Novelty Funsy.
I'd run DNA checks on your two boys.
Hi, this is Corinne. Leave a message.
translation.zh: 嗨 我是歌莲 请留言吧

translation.en: Yeah, except Jimmy Hoch making the A's.
Ah, you know me, Adam. I'm not one for gossip.
translation.zh: 亚当 我不是八卦的人

translation.en: Six weeks ago. But he doesn't want anyone knowing.
translation.zh: 六周前 但他不想别人知道

translation.en: Anyway, he has this headhunter helping him find a job.
translation.zh: 反正 他现在有猎头帮他求职

translation.en: Jimmy's dad? You're kidding. That's outrageous.
translation.zh: 吉米的老爸？你开玩笑 这太离谱了

translation.en: This shit happens all the time.
When it comes to looking after ourselves and our kids, then... [sucks teeth]
translation.zh: 当和我们或者我们的孩子利益相关

translation.en: All right, see you tomorrow, mate.
She made it up. She was never pregnant.
translation.zh: 她编造的 她根本没有怀孕

translation.en: Now you know she's a liar.
translation.zh: 现在你知道她是个骗子

translation.en: [recorded voice] To help us deal with your call quickly,
translation.zh: 为了让我们能尽快处理

translation.en: please tell us in a few words why you are calling today.
translation.zh: 请告诉我们来电的原因

translation.en: I'm sorry. Could you repeat that?
translation.zh: 很抱歉 请问能重复一次吗？

translation.en: -I'm sorry. Could you repeat that? -Speak to a fucking human being!
translation.zh: -很抱歉 请问能重复一次吗？-该死的给我人工客服

translation.en: Please hold while we connect you to one of our representatives.
translation.zh: 请不要挂机 我们现在帮你转接

translation.en: Hello. My name's Peter. How can I help you today?
translation.zh: 你好 我叫彼得 有什么可以帮到你？

translation.en: Yeah, there's a... there's a charge on my account
translation.zh: 对 我的账户之前有笔交易

translation.en: from a while back that I don't recognize.
I think it might be a mistake.
-What's the name of the company? -Novelty Funsy.
And the date of the transaction?
Ah, yeah. Some companies don't bill under their real name.
translation.zh: 对 有些公司的账户名称不用真名

translation.en: Yeah, like in hotels when adult movies appear as something else.
translation.zh: 是的 就像在酒店里成人电影会换个名称一样

translation.en: -Uh, so what is it? -It's an online retailer,
translation.zh: -那是什么？-是一家网上零售商

translation.en: so I'll need to raise a specific inquiry
if you're sure this is something that you didn't purchase.
translation.zh: 如果你确定这不是你买的东西

translation.en: I'll raise the inquiry. Can we get back to you on this number?
translation.zh: 我会进行特定查询之后回复这个号码可以吗？

translation.en: -Is it okay if Daisy stays? -I'll sleep in the spare room.
translation.zh: -黛西在这里过夜可以吗？-我可以睡客房

translation.en: Brother of their star player. It was inevitable.
translation.zh: 明星球员的弟弟 这正常不过

translation.en: -I don't want it to be a big thing. -It won't.

translation.zh: 我们的关系是开放式的

translation.en: This is a very casual kiss.

translation.zh: 我更喜欢这样 比较老派

translation.en: [woman 2] Oh, my God. How was it?
Just the truth. You know, I said that--
Sit! Now come here. Now, sit!
translation.zh: 坐下 过来 坐下

translation.en: Many of them happy, and that's not a failure, that's a success.
translation.zh: 大部分时间都很快乐这不是失败 这是成功

translation.en: But, you know, now it's time for something else.
translation.zh: 但 现在是时候改变一下了

translation.en: I tried a new house analogy,
translation.zh: 我用了个新房子的比喻

translation.en: but that all got a bit muddled.
He slept in the spare room,
but I think that was mostly symbolic.
translation.zh: 但我想这主要是象征性的

translation.en: Sorry, the infant keeps calling me. I better find out what he wants.
translation.zh: 抱歉那个孩子一直打给我我要看看他想怎样

translation.en: I'll tell you what it is, some fucking weird shit.
translation.zh: 我跟你说 有些很奇怪的事

translation.en: What are you doing on that thing?

translation.zh: 在调查罪行 真的很残忍 笑脸

translation.en: Ooh, you're showing your age now, Jo.
It's Johanna. How many times with that?
translation.zh: 是祖安娜 我说了多少次

translation.en: And anyway, I thought you liked us oldies.
translation.zh: 不管怎样 我以为你喜欢我们这些老家伙

translation.en: He's not that old. He's not, like, your age.
translation.zh: 他没那么老 他跟你年纪不同

translation.en: You said your new man was old enough to be your father.
translation.zh: 你说你的新人年纪大得足够做你老爸

translation.en: Yes, technically, but you're actually old enough to be my mother.
translation.zh: 是的 但准确说 你也足够做我老妈
甚至从数学上看 做奶奶都够了

translation.en: No. No, it's just that, lying there like that.
translation.zh: 没有 就是这样 就这样一摊的

translation.en: Oh, it's giving me the creeps.
What do you think's going on there, on the leg?
translation.zh: 你觉得那是什么？腿的位置

translation.en: -Are they bite marks? -[bystander 2] I can't look anymore.
translation.zh: 这是咬痕吗？ 我看不下去了

translation.en: And judging from the size and the shape of the indents...
translation.zh: 根据齿状缺口的大小和形状

translation.en: I'd say there's a reasonable chance that they're human.
We're just looking into an incident about a mile or so from here
translation.zh: 我们在调查一公里外发生的

translation.en: Looks very much like a white alpaca.
translation.zh: 似乎是一只白色的羊驼

translation.en: You think it's one of mine?
Well, logic dictates. You know, they're not the most common--
translation.zh: 很合理 因为这不是很常见的
发生了什么事？它死了吗？

translation.en: Uh, I-- I'm afraid so. Yes, I'm... I'm sorry.
Have you got any CCTV? You know, any...
It's an alpaca farm, not Port Knox.
translation.zh: 这是羊驼农场 不是诺克斯港

translation.en: It's where the Americans keep their gold.
translation.zh: 是美国人存放黄金的地方
不是 我在想恶魔岛
迈克 你什么时候来的？

translation.en: [man] It's Martin. That Parth fella has just turned up.
translation.zh: 我是马丁 柏夫那家伙刚出现

translation.en: -[man 2] Is someone there? -[Martin] He's down there.
[man 2] It's not fucking Silence of the Lambs.
translation.zh: 这不是该死的《沉默的羔羊》

translation.en: Professionally speaking, I have to tell you that this is...
translation.zh: 专业来说 我要告诉你这是…
-别听他说 他是疯子-绑架

translation.en: Well, you are kind of holding him against his will.
I was a cop for 30 years, Adam.
translation.zh: 我做了30年警察 亚当

translation.en: -I understand the definition of kidnap. -[distant banging]
-The door closed behind him. -[man 2] Let me out!
translation.zh: -他进去后门关上了-让我出去

translation.en: But remember whose side you're on.
translation.zh: 但记得你是在哪一边的

translation.en: All right! All right! All right!
Are you fucking kidding me? I've been down there nearly an hour.
translation.zh: 你他妈的开玩笑吗？我被关在下面差不多一小时

translation.en: Calm down? I'm calling the police.
-Give me me phone. -I haven't got it.
-Give him his phone. -He's stolen me fuckin' phone!
translation.zh: -他偷了我的电话-电话还给他

translation.en: You are. He's an old man that doesn't want to move.
translation.zh: 你是的 他是个不想离开的老人

translation.en: Doesn't wanna sell. He's not interested in your redevelopment program.
translation.zh: 他不想卖房子对你的重建项目不感兴趣

translation.en: And he really doesn't appreciate you showing up here unannounced,
translation.zh: 他也不喜欢你没事先打招呼就跑过来

translation.en: waving your big, fat, corporate checkbook around.
translation.zh: 趾高气昂地挥舞着你那支票本

translation.en: Now, we've lodged our objection, we've adhered to the deadline,
translation.zh: 我们提出了反对意见 遵守了限期

translation.en: and now due process needs to take place.
And due process can be very, very slow.
translation.zh: 整个过程会很慢 很慢

translation.en: Okay, you're his lawyer. How much does he want?
translation.zh: 好了 你是他的律师 他想要价多少？

translation.en: I shouldn't tell you this, but I've been authorized to go as high as 400,000.
translation.zh: 我不该告诉你但我的授权最高是40万

translation.en: I shouldn't tell you this, but I've been authorized
translation.zh: 我也不该告诉你 但我被授权

translation.en: to say no to whatever you offer.
translation.zh: 无论你开价多少都拒绝

translation.en: He can't win, the stupid, old fuck!
translation.zh: 他赢不了 这个愚蠢的老家伙

translation.en: And in the end, trust me,
-You think she sleeps with her alpacas? -[Johanna] Nope.
translation.zh: -你觉得她和羊驼一起睡觉吗？-没有
不是做爱 只是抱着

translation.en: Maybe gets one in now and again on a cold winter's night.
translation.zh: 也许在冬天晚上会来一下

translation.en: I know a lad who used to sleep with a massive red setter,
translation.zh: 我认识个小伙子会和很大的红色猎犬一起睡

translation.en: like, under the covers, its head on his pillow.
translation.zh: 像是盖着被子 狗的头在枕头上

translation.en: I said, "Is that not a little--" Stop!
translation.zh: 我说 那不是… 停车
脚印 不是鞋子 是脚

translation.en: [Johanna] Get an ambulance and call for backup!

translation.zh: 这是罗斯探员 需要支援
嗨 请问是普莱斯先生吗？

translation.en: Hi. It's Hashim from Derwent Bank.
translation.zh: 嗨 这是德温银行的哈森

translation.en: I believe you put in a request last night
for the identity of a company that has the billing name...
translation.zh: 关于了解付款账户为奇趣新鲜的

translation.en: Right. Well, I'm afraid we can't identify exactly what the payment relates to.
translation.zh: 很抱歉我们无法核实相关的公司

translation.en: It seems to be an umbrella title that covers several different websites.
translation.zh: 这似乎是关于几个不同网站的总括标题

translation.en: I've got a list of the ISP addresses, which I'm happy to send you,
translation.zh: 我有个互联网服务供应商清单很乐意提供给你

translation.en: but obviously, I can't identify which of these,
if any, is the source of the purchase.
Would you like me to email this to the address we have on file?
translation.zh: 你是否希望我们发送到你的邮箱？

translation.en: Yeah. The lunch thing got canceled.
translation.zh: 是的 午餐安排取消了

translation.en: Oh, come here. Let me hug you.
translation.zh: 噢 过来 让我抱抱你

translation.en: God, none of your friends are watching.
How was the conference? Did Selena behave herself?
translation.zh: 会议怎样了？萨琳娜表现好吗？
会议怎样了？萨琳娜表现好吗？ 萨琳娜在她冲到外面呕吐之前

translation.en: right up until the point she dashed outside to vomit.
-Yeah, I'll do it. -Come on, I wanna hear all about footy.
translation.zh: -好的 我去做-我想听听足球的事

translation.en: Oh, yeah, she stayed the night.
translation.zh: 是的 她在这里过夜

translation.en: [woman] I need her to look after Ella for an hour.
translation.zh: 我要她帮忙照顾艾拉一小时

translation.en: She was supposed to play hockey but suddenly decided--
translation.zh: 她本来要去打冰球 但突然决定

translation.en: [woman] Okay. Well, she's got a stomach ache.
Doesn't feel well, doesn't want to play.
translation.zh: 感觉不舒服 不想去打球

translation.en: However, I've got a training run. Triathlon's in three weeks.
translation.zh: 但是我有跑步训练铁人三项比赛在三周后

translation.en: If you're sick I need to make sure you're with someone.
translation.zh: 如果你病了 我希望你身边有人

translation.en: It's all right. We can take her for an hour.
translation.zh: 没问题 我们可以照顾她一小时

translation.en: Ugh. I don't know what's wrong with her.
Doesn't want to go to school, doesn't want to play sports.
translation.zh: 不想上学 不想打球

translation.en: -She's making up the tummy ache thing. -You know, she's at that age.
translation.zh: -她说肚子痛都是编出来的-这个年纪的孩子

translation.en: Want me to try talking to her?
I supposed it could be worse. Did you hear about Dante?
translation.zh: 我还以为会更糟 你听说了但丁吗？

translation.en: He didn't come home last night.
I was having a surrogate pregnancy.
to pretend that I was going through the normal cycles.
translation.zh: 来伪装自己经历了一般的怀孕周期

translation.en: I'm just showing him what teachers get up to outside of school.
translation.zh: 我给他看了老师的校外活动

translation.en: -What the hell are you talking about? -Can we just skip this part?
translation.zh: -你究竟在说什么？-能不能直接点

translation.en: -What? -The part where you pretend not to know
what I'm talking about. Let's just skip the denials, okay?
translation.zh: 我在说什么这部分你不要否认好吗？

translation.en: I know you faked your pregnancy.
Well, if you know, why are you asking?
translation.zh: 如果你知道 你为什么问？

translation.en: Are you out of your mind?
You faked a pregnancy, Corinne. What else are you capable of?
translation.zh: 你伪造了怀孕 歌莲还有什么事你做不出来？
是的 该死 亚当

translation.en: Look at Tom's face, your eyes, your-- your-- your hair.
translation.zh: 你看看汤姆的样子 眼睛和头发

translation.en: How... How can you even ask me that?
What makes you think I faked a pregnancy?
translation.zh: 你怎么会认为我伪装了怀孕？

translation.en: It's a cover name for a fake pregnancy website.
translation.zh: 那是个假名 背后是提供伪装怀孕服务的网站

translation.en: -Right. How do you know that was for me? -Was it?
translation.zh: -对 你怎么知道那是我？-是你吗？

translation.en: What are you even doing looking through bank statements--?
translation.zh: 你为什么忽然会去查银行账单？

translation.en: Now, you better start talking right now.
translation.zh: 现在 你最好马上交代

translation.en: Do you remember when I had two school periods off during lunch?
translation.zh: 你还记得之前我午餐时有两次课休吗？

translation.en: Well, I used to get out of school for a couple of hours.
translation.zh: 我以前会离开学校几小时

translation.en: I'd go to that café in Portis Books.
translation.zh: 我会去波提斯书店里的咖啡馆

translation.en: I'd get a cup of tea, sit in the corner reading,
translation.zh: 喝杯咖啡 坐在角落看书

translation.en: and after a while, Adam, you become a regular.
The same people will be there like a community--
translation.zh: 那里的人就像社区一样

translation.en: She was eight months pregnant. It was her first baby.
translation.zh: 她已经怀孕八个月了那是她第一个孩子

translation.en: You know how young mothers-to-be are, all glowing
translation.zh: 你知道年轻的准妈妈多容光焕发

translation.en: and over the top like they're the first person to get pregnant--
translation.zh: 就像全世界只有她怀孕一样

translation.en: Great story. Can we get back to the fucking elephant sat here?
translation.zh: 很棒 能不能回到眼前的重点

translation.en: Can you just drop the sarcasm, Adam?
translation.zh: 你能不能别这种语气？亚当

translation.en: I'm trying to tell you something.
And then one day she just stopped coming.
Now, I... I just assumed she'd had the baby.
But she didn't reply to any of my messages.
translation.zh: 但她没有回复任何信息

translation.en: And she just killed all my calls--
translation.zh: 她也拒接了我所有来电

translation.en: -Is this going somewhere? -A few months later,
translation.zh: -究竟有什么意义-几个月之后

translation.en: I saw her again in Starbucks near the library and she was pregnant.
translation.zh: 我在图书馆附近的星巴克看到她她又怀孕了

translation.en: Heavily pregnant, Adam, like eight months.
translation.zh: 已经快生的样子 亚当 像是八个月

translation.en: Well, it didn't make any sense.
So I just-- I held back and I watched her.
translation.zh: 所以我跟在后面悄悄观察

translation.en: And she was with this group of other women in the corner
translation.zh: 她和一帮女人在角落里

translation.en: holding court, talking to them about... about baby names.
translation.zh: 一起谈论着孩子的名字

translation.en: And when she saw me she just looked terrified.
translation.zh: 当她看到我 她满面惊恐

translation.en: Did you say something to her?
She told me some story about having a stillborn. I don't know if it was true--
translation.zh: 她跟我说了个死胎的故事我不知道是否真的

translation.en: Corinne, what are you talking about?
translation.zh: 歌莲 你究竟在说什么？

translation.en: No, no, Corinne, that is not normal behavior.
translation.zh: 不是 歌莲 这不是正常行为

translation.en: Yeah, well, she said her husband didn't care about her. She had no--
translation.zh: 是的 她说她老公不在乎她她没有…

translation.en: What does this got to do with us? You've got children, got me.
translation.zh: 这跟我们有什么关系？你有孩子们 有我

translation.en: Crazy Suzanne and her shitty little life made you think, "I'll fake a baby."
translation.zh: 疯狂苏珊和她的悲惨人生让你想我要伪装怀孕

translation.en: Why would you fake a baby, Corinne?
translation.zh: 你为什么要伪装怀孕？歌莲

translation.en: For attention? Is this some kind of deranged midlife crisis?
translation.zh: 为了吸引关注？这是什么疯狂的中年危机吗？

translation.en: But you need to tell me everything from start to finish--
translation.zh: 但你要告诉我来龙去脉

translation.en: -You're not just gonna walk away. -What are you gonna do? Keep me captive?
translation.zh: -你不能就这样走开-你要做什么？将我关起来吗？

translation.en: What are you gonna do, Adam? Beat it out of me?
translation.zh: 你要做什么？亚当 打我吗？

translation.en: A woman, a stranger. I've never seen her before.
translation.zh: 一个女人 一个我没见过的陌生人

translation.en: -She came up to me and she-- -What woman?
I've just told you, a stranger.
translation.zh: 我跟你说了 是陌生人

translation.en: How does she know any of this?
And you, what, you just believed her?
translation.zh: 还有你 你就这样相信了吗？

translation.en: I will, I promise, but just...
translation.zh: 我会的 我保证 但是…
-不是这样的 现在不行-歌莲？

translation.en: Could've hit a tree, could've been something else.
translation.zh: 可能撞树 也可能是别的东西

translation.en: They're guessing he'd been there for hours.
translation.zh: 他们说他在现场可能有几个小时

translation.en: We pushed through those trees clothed. They're hard to get through.
translation.zh: 我们穿着衣服挣扎着穿过树林那并不容易

translation.en: You aren't darting through at speed and falling down that drop,
translation.zh: 你不会以高速猛地插进去

translation.en: you're coming through slowly, thinking, "Whoa, big drop."
translation.zh: 你会慢慢穿过 一边想 哇 太快了

translation.en: -But if it was dark-- -If it was dark, you'd go even slower.
translation.zh: -但如果当时天黑-如果天黑 只会更慢

translation.en: Hey, trust me, this is my area of expertise.
translation.zh: 嘿 相信我 这是我的专业领域

translation.en: He's run through the woods shedding his clothes.
translation.zh: 他跑过树林 脱掉了衣服

translation.en: Turned on by mutilating an alpaca.
-Let's not jump to conclusions. -No, no, sure.
I mean, two really bizarre events happen within a mile of each other.
translation.zh: 两件奇异的事件在这么近的距离发生

translation.en: Let's find out who he is first. Check for misper calls.
translation.zh: 我们先查清楚他的身份看看失踪人口

translation.en: Someone must be worried this one didn't come home last night.
translation.zh: 他昨晚没回家 肯定有人担心

translation.en: Just what I need. Thank you.
translation.zh: 这正是我需要的 谢谢

translation.en: I'll tell you what, I won't miss the snoring.
translation.zh: 我跟你说 我绝不会怀念他的鼾声

translation.en: He's in the spare room and it's still, like, a thousand decibels.
translation.zh: 他在别的房间但还是有一千分贝那么厉害

translation.en: "Like, a thousand decibels." That infant's rubbing off on you.
translation.zh: 一千分贝 那孩子对你还是有影响

translation.en: There's another good reason to retire.
translation.zh: 这是退休的另一个好理由

translation.en: Come on. I mean, you're gonna be out of a job.
translation.zh: 来吧 你要离开工作

translation.en: We always said we'd do it, Johanna.
translation.zh: 我们总是说要这样做 祖安娜

translation.en: Yeah, which can be looked after.
translation.zh: 是的 可以让人帮忙照看

translation.en: And a husband that can look after them.
Me and you, Thelma and Louise across the states.
translation.zh: 我们两个 穿州过省的末路狂花

translation.en: All we've gotta do is book the flights and we're doing it.
[in Southern accent] "I'm in deep shit, Thelma.
translation.zh: 我有大麻烦 塞尔玛

translation.en: What you said yesterday, you were right.
translation.zh: 你昨天说的事 你是对的

translation.en: And I want to explain, I do.

translation.zh: 但不是像这样 亚当

translation.en: We have this school awards thing tonight.
Why don't we just eat after at Juniper Yard?
translation.zh: 我们可以在之后去杜松院吃饭

translation.en: We can eat and I'll talk,
then we can see where we are.
You know the worst part about all of this?
translation.zh: 你知道最糟糕的是什么？

translation.en: We all have our secrets, Adam.
translation.zh: 我们都有秘密 亚当

translation.en: His name's Dante Gunnarsson. His parents reported him missing yesterday.
translation.zh: 他叫但丁·根拿臣他父母昨天报告他失踪

translation.en: He spends a lot of time out and about so they weren't immediately concerned.
translation.zh: 他经常在户外活动所以他们没有马上警觉
他情况稳定 但没有反应

translation.en: They're doing an EEG this morning.
"The lacerations on the animal are from human teeth."
translation.zh: 动物身上的咬痕确认是人类牙齿造成

translation.en: "Human bite is usually an elliptical injury.
translation.zh: 人类咬痕一般是椭圆形的

translation.en: However, in this case, the pattern is interrupted
translation.zh: 然而在本例中 左二尖瓣的缺失

translation.en: by the absence of a left bicuspid."
Our boy has all his teeth.
Oh, Vicky, can I have a word?
translation.zh: 噢 维琦 能说两句吗？

translation.en: I just wanted to ask, and it's probably not a huge deal,
translation.zh: 我想问 可能不是什么大事

translation.en: but your Ella, she's stopped talking with Mia.
translation.zh: 但你的艾拉不再跟米雅讲话

translation.en: but she won't say what it is.
Do you have any idea what's going on?
I just thought you should know.
She's been a bit down but...
-Hi. This is Corinne. Leave a message. -[beeps]
translation.zh: 嗨 这是歌莲 请留言

translation.en: Sadly, I must begin this evening of celebration with some difficult news.
translation.zh: 很遗憾 今晚的庆祝活动要先说一些坏消息

translation.en: One of our year 12 pupils, Dante Gunnarsson,
translation.zh: 我们一位12级的学生 但丁·根拿臣

translation.en: has been involved in a serious accident.
translation.zh: 涉及一例严重的意外事件

translation.en: And I'm afraid he's in a very worrying condition.
translation.zh: 他目前的情况让人担忧

translation.en: I'm sure you will all join me in wishing him and his family
translation.zh: 希望各位和我一起诚心祝福他和他的家人

translation.en: all the best for his swift recovery.

translation.zh: 但我们必须在困难的时候

translation.en: and this evening is about celebrating

translation.zh: 那些在他们的高中最后一年

translation.en: or excelled... in this, their final year, of high school.
translation.zh: 表现优异 成绩突出的学生

translation.en: And the award for art goes to Kiran Penvell.
translation.zh: 艺术奖项得主是基伦·奔维尔

translation.en: And the one you've all been waiting for,
The award for best sporting achievement goes to Anthony Carter.
translation.zh: 最佳体育成就奖得主是安东尼·卡特

translation.en: The final award this evening is our award, the students',
translation.zh: 今晚最后的奖项 是我们的奖项

translation.en: and we were asked to vote for our teacher of the year.
translation.zh: 由学生们选出的年度最佳老师

translation.en: And I've been asked to say
that it has been a really close competition, as they're all so great.
translation.zh: 这是非常接近的结果他们都是优秀的老师

translation.en: Sadly, there can only be one winner.
translation.zh: 很遗憾奖项只能属于一个人
我不是普莱斯太太 很明显

translation.en: Uh, Corinne can't be here tonight.
But I'd just like to say how much this'll mean to her.
translation.zh: 但我要说 这对她意义重大

translation.en: loves this job, it's her life, and, uh...
translation.zh: 热爱这份工作 这是她的生命

translation.en: she's always cherished the work that she does...
translation.zh: 她珍爱这份工作 因为

translation.en: encouraging you lot to fall in love with...
And as her husband, her passion and...
translation.zh: 作为她的丈夫 她的热情

translation.en: But I will give this to her
and she can come and tell you herself when she feels better.
translation.zh: 等她稍后恢复健康她必定亲自向各位致谢

translation.en: -How can you not know where she is? -Well, do you?
Mum just didn't feel up to it tonight.
translation.zh: 妈妈就是今晚不太舒服

translation.en: Now you know she's a liar.
translation.zh: 现在你知道她是个骗子
